statements: UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_value = 10.5, adjustment_description = 'Adjusted value' WHERE robot_id = 1 AND calibration_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET adjustment_description = 'Fine-tuned value', calibration_value = 12.2 WHERE calibration_value < 10 AND robot_id = 2;
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_value = 0.25 WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_date = '2022-03-15', adjustment_description = 'Adjusted calibration value for precision' WHERE robot_id = 2;
UPDATE Robot_Calibration_Data SET calibration_date = '2021-10-15', calibration_values = '{"value": 10}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Robot_Adjustments SET adjustment_details = 'Adjusted the arm position' WHERE robot_id = 3;
UPDATE Robot_Calibration_Data SET calibration_values = '{"sensor": "high", "value": 50}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Robot_Adjustments SET adjustment_details = 'Adjusted motor speed to 60 RPM' WHERE robot_id = 5;
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_data = '{"accuracy": 0.98}' WHERE robot_id = 123;
UPDATE robot_adjustments SET adjustment_details = 'Adjusted arm alignment' WHERE robot_id = 456;
UPDATE robot_calibration_data SET calibration_data = '{
sensor_data1: 0.5,
sensor_data2: -0.3,
sensor_data3: 0.6}' WHERE robot_id = 1 AND calibration_date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE robot_list SET manufacturer = 'New Manufacturer', year_acquired = 2023 WHERE robot_name = 'RoboTech';

UPDATE RobotAdjustments SET adjustment_value = 3.8, adjustment_date = '2022-11-15' WHERE robot_id = 2;

UPDATE robot_data SET calibration_date = '2022-10-15', adjustment_1 = 5.2 WHERE robot_id = 101;
UPDATE robot SET manufacturer = 'New Manufacturer', model = 'New Model 2' WHERE id = 201;
UPDATE robot_data SET calibration_date = '2022-06-15', adjustment_1 = 10.5 WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE calibration_logs SET technician = 'John Doe', calibration_date = '2022-06-20', success = TRUE WHERE robot_id = 2;
